name: Tanis Half-Elven
description: Leader of the Heroes of the Lance, struggling with his dual heritage

name: Raistlin Majere
description: Ambitious mage with hourglass eyes and golden skin, Master of Past and Present

name: Caramon Majere
description: Raistlin's twin brother, strong and loyal warrior

name: Sturm Brightblade
description: Noble Knight of Solamnia, dedicated to the Oath and the Measure

name: Tasslehoff Burrfoot
description: Curious and fearless kender with a talent for 'finding' things

name: Goldmoon
description: Chieftain's daughter and first true cleric of Mishakal in centuries

name: Riverwind
description: Plainsman warrior and Goldmoon's devoted husband

name: Kitiara Uth Matar
description: Dragon Highlord and half-sister to Caramon and Raistlin

name: Laurana Kanan
description: Elven princess who becomes the Golden General

name: Fizban
description: Seemingly absent-minded wizard, actually Paladine in disguise

name: Tika Waylan
description: Former barmaid who became a skilled warrior
